attributes.action: Apologise to the aborigines of australia and put pressure on Australian Government to do more to improve aborigines rights and living conditions
attributes.additional_details: The first Australians have suffered horribly since our arrival in 1788 and our Parliament should accept responsibility for our role played in there suffering. Secondly the debate should be used to pressure the Australian Government to do more to tackle the dire situation that Aborigines find themselves. To tackle the abuses by the police, to provide livable housing and to accept the historical and systematic abuses of there human rights. To pressure the Australian Government to tackle the serious health problems, which have long been defeated in all rich and developed countries.To expect a better treatment of those who were there before them.
